verse: The Philistines gathered for battle at Aphek, while the armies of Israel camped near the spring of Jezreel.
The armies of the Philistines were marching forward by hundreds and by thousands, and David and his men were marching in the rear with King Achish.
So the next morning, David and his men got up early and traveled south to the land of the Philistines, but the Philistine army went north to Jezreel.
